messages: 54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:50): how do I find the build number for my html5boilerplate project after I've run "ant build -Denv=dev"?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (13:51): we dont have a concept of a build number
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:51): also is there a way to skip the image optimaisation step? tried setting images.bypass = * in project.properties.

54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:52): 2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e: okay thanks, I just read it on the h5bp website @ http://html5boilerplate.com/docs/Build-script/#here-is-how-the-environments-work
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:53): for my second question I guess i could run ant text -Denv=dev ?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (13:53): 54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d: yes you can skip image optimization by using ant text
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (13:53): you can do ant text dev
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (13:53): yeah i think it should work
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:53): I just pulled the last h5bp from git so I should be up to date now :)
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:54): "Building a Production Environment" is the initial message in my terminal when I ran ant text dev
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:55): I guess it really doesn't matter whether it's a dev or production build?..
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:55): THANKS :) that would be swell... Still quite confused wit hant
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:57): (BUILD FAILED Target "dev" does not exist in the project "Boilerplate Build". )
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (13:57): 54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d: why do you need a dev build?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (13:57): you dont want to minify your scripts?
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:57): I don't, I just want to try and use the build script as it was intended :)
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (13:58): yeah it is working, just "ant text dev" didn't work :)
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (14:01): say I have 10 html files that I want to "build"; what's the best practice/consensus for how to add them to the list of files to be minified?
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (14:05): ant text is only copying the img js and css folders to the publish folder
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (14:07): i mean should it do anything else?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (14:07): 54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d: can you file a bug at the github repo?
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (14:10): 54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d: if you have some time to update the documentation also that would be great!
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (14:10): given you have been doing such exhaustive testing of the build script :)
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (14:19): How do I update the docs though?
54d3e96d4ac6c056428095f01ab8373d (14:33): forget about the last message "how do I up...." found it at https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate/wiki

045d397902a1833a5159d59338dc404c (14:43): when you have a notebook or monitor with multi touch capability will you get them as touch events in your browser in html5? or is there something you need to do?
